Utils¶

src.utils.calendar.initTimeRange()¶

tuple of working times from 9AM to 10PM

Parameters:

N/A

return:

list of tuple of paired times between 9AM to 10PM [(0,9:00AM),(15,9:15AM),(30,9:30AM),…]

src.utils.calendar.minuteToAmPm(minute)¶

translating from minute to AM or PM between 9AM and 10PM

Parameters:

minute (int): total number of minute starting from 9AM (0 minute)

return:

between 9AM and 10PM
